title: Orc high priest
data:
***Version [0.28](/0.28 "0.28")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

| orc high priest o [![Orc high priest.png](/images/b/b1/Orc_high_priest.png)](/File:Orc_high_priest.png) |                                                                                                                                                                                |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |

| [XP](/XP "XP")                                                                                          | 839                                                                                                                                                                            |

| Attack1                                                                                                 | 7 ([hit](/Attack_type "Attack type"): [plain](/Attack_flavour "Attack flavour"))                                                                                               |
| [Resistances](/Resistance "Resistance")                                                                 | None                                                                                                                                                                           |
| [Vulnerabilities](/Vulnerability "Vulnerability")                                                       | [Holy](/Holy "Holy")                                                                                                                                                           |

| [Uses](/Item_usage "Item usage")                                                                        | [Weapons & armour](/Category:Weapons_armour "Category:Weapons armour") [Starting equipment](/Item_usage "Item usage") [Open doors](/Category:Open_doors "Category:Open doors") |
| [Holiness](/Holiness "Holiness")                                                                        | [Natural](/Category:Natural_holiness "Category:Natural holiness")                                                                                                              |

|   |                                                                                                                                          |
| - | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | An exalted servant of the orc god Beogh and a master of many black rites, to whose aid Beogh will even send beings from the netherworld. |

*For a list of all orcs, see [list of orcs](/List_of_orcs "List of orcs").*

## Contents

- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
- [2 Spells](#Spells)
- [3 Tips & Tricks](#Tips_.26_Tricks)
- [4 History](#History)

## Useful Info

**Orc high priests** are similar to [orc priests](/Orc_priest "Orc priest"), but are significantly more dangerous. Along with their [smite](/Smite "Smite") attack, they can summon dangerous demons and heal themselves as well as their allies. They are often found in the [Orcish Mines](/Orcish_Mines "Orcish Mines") (but may appear earlier).

## Spells

| Spell set I |                                                         |                                                                                                             |
| :---------- | ------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1       | [Pain](/Pain "Pain") (d14)                              | [Priest flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags")                                                         |
| Slot2       | [Summon Demon](/Summon_Demon "Summon Demon")            | [Priest flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags")                                                         |
| Slot3       | [Smiting](/Smiting "Smiting") (7-17)                    | [Priest flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags")                                                         |
| Slot4       | [Heal Other](/Heal_Other "Heal Other") (2d5+3)          | [Priest flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags")                                                         |
| Slot5       | [Minor Healing](/Minor_Healing "Minor Healing") (2d5+3) | [Emergency flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags"), [Priest flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |

## Tips & Tricks

Most characters first exploring the Orcish Mines aren't prepared for dealing with several [tier-3 demons](/Tier-3_demon "Tier-3 demon") along with a horde of heavily armed orcs, so try not to give orc high priests time to summon much. Don't be afraid to run if a fight suddenly gets overwhelmingly dangerous.

## History

- Prior to [0.28](/0.28 "0.28"), orc high priests could [see invisible](/See_invisible "See invisible").

Orc high priest

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.28: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
orc high priest o 
HP 36-74
HD 11
XP 839
Speed 10
AC 3
EV 11
Will 60
Attack1 7 (hit: plain)


Resistances None
Vulnerabilities Holy
Habitat Land
Intelligence Human
Uses Weapons & armour
Starting equipment
Open doors
Holiness Natural
Size Medium
Type orc, orc
Flags Speaks
Warm-blooded
An exalted servant of the orc god Beogh and a master of many black rites, to whose aid Beogh will even send beings from the netherworld.

For a list of all orcs, see list of orcs.


Contents

  • 1 Useful Info
  • 2 Spells
  • 3 Tips & Tricks
  • 4 History

Useful Info

Orc high priests are similar to orc priests, but are significantly more dangerous. Along with their smite attack, they can summon dangerous demons and heal themselves as well as their allies. They are often found in the Orcish Mines (but may appear earlier).

Spells

Spell set I
Slot1 Pain (d14) Priest flag
Slot2 Summon Demon Priest flag
Slot3 Smiting (7-17) Priest flag
Slot4 Heal Other (2d5+3) Priest flag
Slot5 Minor Healing (2d5+3) Emergency flag,
Priest flag

Tips & Tricks

Most characters first exploring the Orcish Mines aren't prepared for dealing with several tier-3 demons along with a horde of heavily armed orcs, so try not to give orc high priests time to summon much. Don't be afraid to run if a fight suddenly gets overwhelmingly dangerous.

History

  • Prior to 0.28, orc high priests could see invisible.
